name: aurion-swap

scripts.git-commit-push: git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (git add . && git commit -m "Something just got updated!" && git push origin main)
scripts.git-commit-push-force: git add . && git commit -m "Something just got updated!" --no-verify && git push origin main --force

description: Aurion Swap is a decentralized token swapping platform built on the Solana blockchain. It enables users to easily swap tokens with a user-friendly interface, real-time data, and wallet integration. The project leverages the speed and low transaction costs of Solana, providing a seamless experience for users looking to manage their crypto assets.
author: Agbaka Daniel U. italiancode <italianloader@gmail.com>
